Header: Southern Provincial Minister D.V. Upul’s statement is a threat to Police
Content: The Police Media Spokesman ASP Ruwan Gunasekera said that the statement made by Southern Provincial Fisheries Minister D.V. Upul referring to the FCID  has posed a threat to the police. He said that investigations are currently underway in connection with the threatening statement by D.V. Upul. Former President Mahinda Rajapaksa’s son MP Namal Rajapaksa was also present at this meeting where D.V. Upul made this statement. Police Media Spokesman ASP Ruwan Gunasekera also said that D.V. Upul could be arrested regarding his threatening statement made against police. Meanwhile, addressing a meeting held in Negombo, Public Security and Christian Affairs Minister John Amaratunga said that D.V. Upul’s threatening statement on police had insulted the former president.
